questions.question_text:
You and a Microsoft Support Engineer are troubleshooting an Azure Stack Hub integrated system.
The security team at your company requires an audit trail whenever management actions are performed on the integrated system.
You unlock the privileged endpoint (PEP) and perform several troubleshooting tasks that resolve the issue.
Which cmdlet should you run next?

DRAG DROP -
You have an Azure Stack Hub integrated system.
You need to ensure that you can recover managed and unmanaged disks that are deleted from user subscriptions.
Which three actions should you perform in sequence? To answer, move the appropriate actions from the list of actions to the answer area and arrange them in the correct order.
Select and Place:
//IMG//

discussion.content: correct as we see from link provided

questions.question_text:
DRAG DROP -
You have an Azure Stack Hub integrated system that is disconnected from the Internet.
During an update, an error occurs that prevents you from accessing the administrator portal.
While troubleshooting the issue, a Microsoft Support Engineer requests that you collect and send the relevant logs.
Which three actions should you perform in sequence? To answer, move the appropriate actions from the list of actions to the answer area and arrange them in the correct order.
Select and Place:
//IMG//

HOTSPOT -
You start the update of an Azure Stack Hub integrated system. The Update run details are shown in the following exhibit.
//IMG//

Use the drop-down menus to select the answer choice that completes each statement based on the information presented in the graphic.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
Hot Area:
//IMG//

discussion.content:
Section 1: Running with 3 errors 
Section 2: Process of elimination...
Cannot "cancel the update"
Should never run Repair-AzsScaleUnitNode during an update
Should not Stop and Start-AzureStack as this restarts all roles and nodes. 
Restart-AzsInfrastrucureRole would not resolve errors. 
Thinking it does need to lean toward contacting MS support.

https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure-stack/operator/azure-stack-troubleshooting?view=azs-2008#troubleshoot-azure-stack-hub-updates

comments.content: but..after considering 4->2 must be more correct)

choices.D: a browser session to the administrator portal
choices.C: a PowerShell remoting session to the PEP

discussion.content:
There is currently only an error icon displayed instead of a mentioned table regarding: "Datacenter Environment - The Chicago datacenter of Litware contains the infrastructure shown in the following table."

Similarly, there is another error icon displayed regarding: " Technical Requirements - Litware identifies the following technical requirements:
Implement an infrastructure to support Azure Functions on the integrated system in Boston."

Please correct.

Thanks.

questions.question_text:
You need to implement the management app. The solution must meet the technical requirements.
What should you use?
